website_summaries.verdict: A retro-looking fixture that offers plenty of atmosphere, illumination, and outstanding quality for the price.
pros: Downward-facing lights provide plenty of illumination thanks to wide-diameter shades
Easy to install if you've done it before
cons: Installation can be tricky for the inexperienced, as a wall plate isn’t included

customer_reviews.title: Love the look but not the function
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 3 light vanity fixture in galvanized for my bathroom. I love the look, however, i wish it had some holes in the top of each shade as I didn't realize how downwardly directed the light would be instead of filling the whole room with light. It's like standing in front of the mirror with three flashlights above me. Lots of shadows, which is fine in some areas but not great in a bathroom when that's the only light fixture in the room. Thank goodness I have a skylight for that extra light needed during the day! I will keep it but will try different bulbs to see if that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Vanity Light
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this light. Great quality for the price and it goes well with my farmhouse rustic vibe. The finish is more matte and less glossy than the picture suggests.
customer_reviews.author: Nike9Mislit

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light!  Guests love the look!
customer_reviews.text: This light was perfect for my guest bathroom. Easy installation and it looks great! I wasn't sure if the downward lighting would be good for looking in the mirror or lighting up the bathroom but it is. Lots of compliments on the light. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: logan

customer_reviews.title: ... remodel and we gets tons of comments about how great the light is
customer_reviews.text: Used this light fixture in our bathroom remodel and we gets tons of comments about how great the light is! Something different that you don't just find at Lowe's or Home Depot, which is exactly what I wanted! Gives great personality to a small/medium space. The light seemed dim with regular bulbs but once you go and get the LED lights, it as great!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Soran

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, but light not evenly "cast" around room
customer_reviews.text: The vanity light looks nice and was simple to install. These lights look very nice, I'm happy with the purchase. The only thing I will say that is different about it is that the shades are metal and the light doesn't go "through" them, so all light is cast down and the area above the lights is definitely darker. Not that you need it lit up above the lights, but it's a bit odd when you are used to having light cast more evening around the room.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M

customer_reviews.title: Missing the mounting hardware.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking light. The mounting hardware was not included in the box. Yes, I checked all the packing to make sure it wasn't hidden in one of the packing pieces. I will be contacting them to see if they'll send me what I need, otherwise I'll have to find something that will work. Very upsetting when you plan a day to hang all the lights and you're missing essential parts. The time I'm going to waste trying to make something work will cost me more than actually using the light. Another day will be wasted just to install 1 light. I will update after I hear from or if I hear from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: L8N8

customer_reviews.title: Great product at an even greater price!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a specific look for out new rustic bathroom, and this fit the bill perfectly! At less than HALF what I was able to find or order locally! It was very well packaged, and shipped fast. It is very, very light, which was shocking at first, but I concider a very good quality for something that sticks out and hangs off a single point on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a budget friendly vanity light. Ours was an old Hollywood style encased in builders grade oak with a false shelf that let dust settle in. Very ugly and very unsanitary. We know we won’t be in this house much longer so I didn’t want a deep investment. Perfect option. Very matte finish, came quick and was super easy to install. It took longer to get the old one down than it did to put the new one up. Got a deal through amazon warehouse and was very happy with the condition. I will be looking at some of their other items for future products for sure!
customer_reviews.author: OurFamily

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Love this light fixture! Was easy to install and looks amazing in our bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the look I was looking for. Great quality, easy to install. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: C-Berg

customer_reviews.title: Mitigates light pollution
customer_reviews.text: I have a bathroom with a skylight window in the ceiling above the bathroom light fixture and I didn't want to shine light up into the sky unnecessarily to contribute to light pollution. So this fixture with some half chrome LED light bulbs (4w, 2700K) prevents light from shining directly above the horizon line and the bulbs won't cause glare disabilities because it indirectly illuminates bathroom. It took a week to arrive and the styrofoam disintegration made a mess but it was easy to install and looks good. #darksky
customer_reviews.author: Jeff D. P.

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: I found this as an open box/return. I figured I could return it if I had any issues. So I really didn’t take any risk and instead have a gorgeous look to finish my new bathroom remodel
customer_reviews.author: RileyD

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this light fixture
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this light fixture. I've paired it with led Edison bulbs for a great look. The inside of the "globes" is white so they really put out a lot of light. I didn't pay attention to the width so wasn't able to use it where I had planned but thankfully I was able to use it in another bathroom. I also purchase the single ceiling lights to match. Did I mention how great the price is? Very unique fixture! Would go well with a variety of tastes- farmhouse / industrial / lodge / etc
customer_reviews.author: S&W

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase - just the look I was going for! Value was a lot better than other 3-light options I was finding, and everything looked good in the craftsmanship; very light; love the slight galvanized look it has. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LeafynotBeefy

customer_reviews.title: so easy to install
customer_reviews.text: beautiful fixture. install (for me) was quite easy. the electrical box hardware included made the install very simple. however you should always consider an electrician to install, since they are insured, and may prevent you from getting a nasty shock (but the cost for the electician to install may shock you anyway) I'm just sayin..
customer_reviews.author: charles

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Used in our farmhouse style bathroom update. Easy to install. Larger presence than I thought. I love them! I almost stayed them black, but against the mindful grey paint and the urbane bronze vanity ( and soon to be framed mirror) this coffee bronze is beautiful! Next step is getting the right bulbs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing farmhouse light fixture
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this light fixture. It makes me happy every morning when I look at it in my bathroom. I installed it by myself with no trouble, and I have little to no experience with this kind of thing. It looks amazing. Even better than the pictures. You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Lane R.

customer_reviews.title: Great price, tons of compliments
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a vanity light that looked great, without costing an arm and a leg. I hate that standard "builder grade look." Yes, these are painted, but unless you're hanging out on a ladder, no one will notice that. It looks great, and I get tons of compliments. I bought edison style LED bulbs to go in here. It looks great, matches the industrial/farmhouse look I was going for.
customer_reviews.author: chilly1313

customer_reviews.title: looks great, installed easy
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect look for our bathroom. I expected the housings to be a little thicker material, but I do not discount any stars for this since it installed easily (leveling was a little bit of a challenge), and really should not have any impacts as a light. At this price point, it was a win.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not great
customer_reviews.text: From a distance this light looks great but it is very flimsy. Installation was as easy as every other vanity light however I could not get the unit to stay secure no matter how tight I turned the decorative screws. Ended up sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: JD1418

customer_reviews.title: Not what I think is antique white
customer_reviews.text: I haven't installed these yet. My electrician arrives tomorrow because I had to distress these lights myself. I bought two for my vanity because they said antique white in the description. They are a perfect uniform matte bright white finished. Nice. Not distressed, and not what I think of antique white.
customer_reviews.author: Christin E. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Somewhat Tricky Installation
customer_reviews.text: I love this fixture. It looks awesome in our retro bathroom with edison bulbs (not included). The only reason I didn't give it a 5 is because the installation was a bit tricky for my husband. It didn't include a plate to screw in the fixture - the fixture has something like a bracket that goes directly into the wall, but it moves around a bit, making it hard to get the fixture level.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light fixture
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light fixture. Easy to install. The only negative I believe other reviews have mentioned was that the light is reflected downward due to the design, so it is a little dim. Luckily the room I installed has natural light coming in, so this was not a deal breaker. In a room with no natural light, it'd be something to keep in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Dreher

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this light fixture. We are in the process of remodeling our master bathroom and I really like the industrial look of this fixture. My husband was a little worried that it might be to warehouse looking but changed his mind upon seeing it in person. So excited to get our remodel complete with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Green

customer_reviews.title: Perfect farm decor light
customer_reviews.text: I love this light. I replaced the standard 3 bulb light in the guest bath with this light. Its just as bright but shines down more than up at the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FARMHOUSE STYLE FIXTURE!
customer_reviews.text: STUNNING! We put this in our remodeled bathroom, along with the matching overhead single light. I LOVE it!! It looks so expensive and chic! Get this light, you will NOT be disappointed! FRACTION of the cost of what they are at Lowes and Depot.
customer_reviews.author: SixCallMeMom

customer_reviews.title: Color was definitely more bronze than expected, but even ...
customer_reviews.text: Color was definitely more bronze than expected, but even more the packaging was a wreck and the bars were by no means straight. The two wing lights were much lower than the center and the center piece was somewhat mangled. Looked really cheap. Sadly, my project took longer than expected to get to lighting and I missed my return window.
customer_reviews.author: Cannon Laws

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how to send a message. I ordered one of these about a year ago for one bathroom and I loved it, so I ordered another for my other bathroom. I just now had a chance to open the box and install it, and the hardware is missing. If the hardware was replaced, I would happily give a 5 star review cause I think it's a great little update for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie L Wood

customer_reviews.title: Grrrrrrrr
customer_reviews.text: Under normal circumstances, I would love this light. BUT because one of the rings that holds the shade on is missing, it has delayed me from hanging it. Now I have to order a replacement ring. Found one for 82 cent with a $3 shipping charge! Now I’ve paid $4 more for the light and I have to wait a week or more to hang it!
customer_reviews.author: CinderellaRN

customer_reviews.title: I Bought These for Another Home Too
customer_reviews.text: I bought these again for another remodel home because they are pretty and go with the modern farmhouse look that I like right now.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Knoiwles

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and price!
customer_reviews.text: Renovating the bathroom myself and it’s almost done! This light fixture is really bringing it together and a very nice look! I installed it myself, it was really easy. Got the nice light bulbs so it looks so farmhouse-y! Good quality and great look.
customer_reviews.author: audrieann111

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice antique looking fixture for the money. It was easy to install and I'm happy with it. The only reason I'm giving 4 stars is because the finish does not appear old, classic, or antique. It's just an even dark bronze color, not rubbed or distressed bronze. I would have been extremely happy and gave it 5 stars with a nicer finish.
customer_reviews.author: EW

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this light for my bathroom. Hoping the lights are bright enough! Update: 4 months later and these are great! Good lighting to do my hair and makeup. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Love the look.
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't been installed yet so no review for that. But love the look. Can't wait to install!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Love the look!
customer_reviews.text: We love the look! Looks great in our newly remodeled bath! I can't comment on the installation, because we had a professional install the light. He apparently didn't have any issues, however. It is very light-weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Industrial design at a discount
customer_reviews.text: Can’t believe the price for this fixture. Great quality, great size, love the industrial design. Makes a big impact for our sons bathroom vanity
customer_reviews.author: Heather Morrisroe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best light fixture in my house! It’s beautiful and was super easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We love it! It is beautiful and perfect for the space I bought it for!
customer_reviews.author: An Herbalist at Home

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Was great BUT had to return because it didn’t fit the area I needed
customer_reviews.author: Mankit Tsui

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Complete garbage. All of the pieces were not in the box. The mounting bracket, no in the box. Missing screws. On top of all of that, the main part was twisted and wouldn’t sit flush even if I wanted it to.
customer_reviews.author: Nic B

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome! Feels lighter than you feel like it should, almost cheap. But once installed looks nice and expensive. No issues installing! No to mention it was 50% cheaper than at local stores
customer_reviews.author: Michelle King

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: We love these. Looks great and easy to put up! Gave us the farm look we were looking for
customer_reviews.author: Gumby

customer_reviews.title: Grew on me
customer_reviews.text: Love the style, price, and relative ease to install. Definitely an adjustment to how light fills room from the standard builder light bar. I think if we were able to hang higher on wall the light would fill room better...but we had to make current location of box work. It has grown on me and definitely is a great price point to update with a farmhouse flair.
customer_reviews.author: ap

customer_reviews.title: quality materials, easy install.
customer_reviews.text: Great finish and style. Quality gage metal on the lampshade. Feels and looks solid. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Jerimiah

customer_reviews.title: Work fine but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Really really cheap, served its purpose and looks really nice. The craftsmanship is just really shotty. The height I have them youd never know so just depends on your application!
customer_reviews.author: Druu_Down

customer_reviews.title: Love this for Bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these lights. Love them! I have farmhouse décor so they went perfectly in my bathrooms. They give off just the right amount of light and look great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the bathrooms at my business. They are really nice! They are great for a rustic/industrial theme.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Gagliardi

customer_reviews.title: Great farmhouse light!
customer_reviews.text: 1st one received was packaged horrible & bent! Received a replacement ASAP! Looks great in our farmhouse remodel! Love this light with vintage LED lightbulb.
customer_reviews.author: Kikidee

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts, misleading color
customer_reviews.text: This was needed asap for a renovation on an investment property. Crossbar and ball nuts were missing. Couldn't wait another 2 days for a new one so I had to search for these and purchase them at Home Depot. Also, the description is for oil rubbed bronze which this color is not. Color is brown and obviously different than the rest of the hardware in bathroom. If I wasn't in a rush, I would've returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia C.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and unique
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this light and in fact got two of them and put one in each bathroom when we remodeled. Attractive and unique.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Custome

customer_reviews.title: Just beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I just remodeled my bathroom and wanted something unique for a light. This light is just beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good farmhouse look
customer_reviews.text: Very farmhouse, clean look. We had these two awkward wall lights on the back wall of our living room and it's perfect because I have one of these over my desk and one over our girls craft table/reading nook.
customer_reviews.author: Jared H.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected, especially for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Package was damaged. Overall the fixture is pretty but you only see bulbs in your face. Will be returning if they will allow. I keep getting screwed on returning 1/4 of then MANY items I purchase on a regularly basis. Please assist, Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Great fixture
customer_reviews.text: Great price - well made and sturdy. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Attractive fixture for rustic look.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the look. Works with the style we were creating for the bathroom. Way better than anything from the local home stores.
customer_reviews.author: A Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lights
customer_reviews.text: We love these lights, just what we wanted with a great price, our bathroom was in desperate need of an update and on a fixed budget these were perfect. Highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can never have too much light over your mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2.....They are beautiful in my bathroom. Larger than what I thought but look great!
customer_reviews.author: Robin K.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a rustic light fixture for your bathroom this is the perfect light fixture to order great product for a very affordable price!!
customer_reviews.author: Erika Arrington Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous but rough finish
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful to look at however rough scratchy finish makes the top of the lamp irritating to clean as it is abrasive enough to shred paper towels.
customer_reviews.author: Southernburn

customer_reviews.title: Not Oil Rubbed Bronze
customer_reviews.text: This is not oil rubbed bronze as listed. The box arrives saying coffee bronze and this is definitely not dark like other oil rubbed bronze items. Clashed with my bathroom and had t return
customer_reviews.author: Emily M

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our bathroom. Looks great and adds a lot of lighting. Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: First thing noticed in our updated bath Color and design are in point! Great price too
customer_reviews.author: debra gordon

customer_reviews.title: Came missing a shade
customer_reviews.text: This was my second product from this brand to return. I bought a single light flush mount to match and it had a broken piece. It was quickly exchanged and the replacement was fine. This 3-light one came in missing a shade so it also had to be sent back. Not detrimental, but annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Cute and economical
customer_reviews.text: Cute and economical light. Fast to install, came with wire nuts and mounting hardware. I used the hardware already in my wall but the hardware it came with looked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Perez

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: This looks amazing in my bathroom,it’s beautiful and at an amazing price,highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CindyJean

customer_reviews.title: Great vanity light and for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great vanity light and for a great price! This vanity light beats the competition!!! You will not find something comparable at home depot or lowes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than pictures. Bought some of the Edison bulbs to go in it
customer_reviews.author: Leslie B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to go in my master bath over the sink. Great quality and look! Obsessed with the farmhouse look it gave my bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Bibey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful farmhouse vanity light
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this vanity light! It's beautiful in our guest bathroom. Bigger than is thought but just perfect! And with LED's the room is very bright!
customer_reviews.author: AngiZ

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: color wasn't what I expected. Not a real oil rubbed bronze more copper.
customer_reviews.author: Rene A.

customer_reviews.title: This light is beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase, using in bathroom of farmhouse. It was very bright, but dimmer bulbs made it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Looks Expensive and Easy Install
customer_reviews.text: What a great value, and super easy to install. We installed this as an over sink fixture in a spare kitchen in our home, and it looks much nicer than that price suggests.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Kash

customer_reviews.title: Nice light
customer_reviews.text: This light is just what I was looking. I don’t find it dark with LED light bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny :D
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these last week, install was really simple and I have no electrical background. These look really nice in my bathroom and seem to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Nitifbaby

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing. Couldn’t believe what I got for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap alternative to more expensive units. But you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: looks..ok. I wish the inside wasn’t white. That’s what kills it for me. And it’s very cheap feeling. No weight to it.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect farmhouse style
customer_reviews.text: These went great on my shiplap wall. Just the right size and they don’t stick out too far from the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Sadl4x

customer_reviews.title: Love the rustic/industrial feel
customer_reviews.text: Love these and they are much bigger then I expected they would be! Give a great rustic/industrial touch. These are galvanized.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: For price decent
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, feels like Chinese quality. One came dented, no problem with exchange
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and design. Gave off amazing light. Would definitely recommend and I’m glad I bought two of them
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well priced
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of them to hang over my bathroom mirrors. I love them! They are easy to install and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Brea

customer_reviews.title: Cheap paint finish and NO Returning!
customer_reviews.text: Galvanized Steel finish is not accurate. It is cheap looking paint. Tried to return but no returns! Back to Lowes.
customer_reviews.author: go2ri2l

customer_reviews.title: Bathroom lights
customer_reviews.text: We put these lights in our bathroom, put Edison bulbs in them, they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Cessna

customer_reviews.title: Looks great for that 'barn' feeling that we were going for
customer_reviews.text: Have this as a fixture over the mirror in our bathroom in our 'shouse. Looks great for that 'barn' feeling that we were going for.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Gragg

customer_reviews.title: Great Light for Rustic Industrial Settings
customer_reviews.text: Easy install and very reasonably priced. Used it in our basement half-bathroom above the sink. Recommend an old fashioned filament bulb to complete the look.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: It looks better than the photo.  Although lightweight, it is an elegant piece.
customer_reviews.text: We installed in the guest bath over the vanity in our new house. Added LED bulbs and it gives a bright light in the entire bath. Couldn't be happier with these lights!
customer_reviews.author: BEVERLY G

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: Pretty but hard to clean. Everything seems to stick to the textured surface
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: but is more like a cherry/burgandy finish
customer_reviews.text: Material is a bit on the cheap side. Think cheap tin can. The paint is not true Oil Rubbed Bronze, but is more like a cherry/burgandy finish. Does not have that ORB look but more of a brushed metal finish.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: love the look of this
customer_reviews.text: love the look of this. I purchased antique light blubs that really made this piece original. love it! good light
customer_reviews.author: Redblaze18

customer_reviews.title: Nice product and looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Some people complained light was not bright enough. Install led bulbs. Watts well below rating for fixture.Lookes great in new full remodel of guest bath. Would recommend. B.G.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G.

customer_reviews.title: it looks great, was easy to hang and worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Can't be beat for the price. A little cheap looking, however, it looks great, was easy to hang and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Love Europe and remodeled the bathroom in a European style ...
customer_reviews.text: Love Europe and remodeled the bathroom in a European style using a early 20th century vanity and bowl. This light assembly really brought the Euro theme together.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: a great light at a competitive price
customer_reviews.text: I bought one, installed it and then ordered another one for my spare bathroom. I love the design and it really updated the old fashioned look of our bathrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Fi Mora

customer_reviews.title: Love! Looks darker in the pic
customer_reviews.text: Love! Looks darker in the pic. The color is a pretty dark brown. Looks great with Edison light bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Liset

customer_reviews.title: Bam! What a showstopper
customer_reviews.text: Ez and great looking! Made a huge impact on beach condo redo! Great price
customer_reviews.author: DEBRA L. BANDUCCI

customer_reviews.title: very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: very easy to install, easy to follow instructions and not trips to the hardware store for parts that were not included
customer_reviews.author: S Waltermeyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Light!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this light! Looks great and puts off a good amount of light. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: B.J. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the. Ost
customer_reviews.text: Thin metal but who grabs the lights? Worth the $
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: missing a piece
customer_reviews.text: When shipped it was missing one of the rings that screws on holding one of the pendants in place... I have to go find one somewhere else now.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Verhoven

customer_reviews.title: Perfect light for my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to go over a large barn wood framed mirror in one of our bathrooms. It was the perfect touch! I’m in love and you can’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Fortune11

product_meta.title: Design House 520320 Kimball Industrial Farmhouse Indoor Wall Light with Metal Shade, Vanity, Coffee Bronze
product_meta.description: Size:Vanity Light| Color:Coffee BronzeThe Design House 520320 Kimball 3 Light Vanity Light features a modern design and a textured, coffee bronze finish with metal shades. This vanity can be used for bathroom vanity lighting and offers reliable illumination with an industrial design. This model uses (3) 60 Watt medium base incandescent bulb (A19 Bulb Type). Bathroom vanity is designed for wall mount applications. Metal cage measures 6-1/8 in. x 9 in. dia. This unit is ETL/cETL Listed and suitable for indoor use. The Design House 520320 Bathroom Vanity comes with a 10-year limited warranty. Design House offers products in multiple home decor categories including lighting, ceiling fans, hardware and plumbing products. With years of hands-on experience, Design House understands every aspect of the home decor industry, and devotes itself to providing quality products across the home decor spectrum.
feature_bullets: Wall mount applications for bathroom vanities
Uses (3) 60 Watt medium base bulb (A19 Type)
